reason: CASCADE MECHANISM OMITTED: The defining feature of PushTASEP is the pushing cascade â€” when a particle displaces a weaker one, the displaced particle becomes activated and must itself cascade further until a vacancy absorbs. The node's description ('pushes into the next weaker particle, displacing it with probability (1-t)') describes only one step, not the full cascade. Without the cascade, the chain is not well-defined and is NOT the t-PushTASEP.
